sections.title: What you get
bullets: Protected lessons with watermarking, preview limits, and download rules
Storefront per school: landing, catalog, checkout, thank you
Quizzes: teacher builder, student attempts, course integration
Strict multi-tenancy enforcement (school isolation + scoped entities)
Vault + Feature Registry: zero feature loss, everything discoverable

sections.title: Built for real schools

hero.heading: Frequently asked questions
hero.body: Answers about protected content, entitlements, and multi-school operation.

sections.title: Does it prevent copying?
sections.body: We apply UI-layer protection (copy/print/download blocks) plus watermarking and entitlement gating.

sections.title: Can each school have its own storefront?
sections.body: Yes — each school has its own storefront at /s/<slug> with its own catalog and policies.

sections.title: Can students preview?
sections.body: Schools can allow previews with limits (questions/time/word count) before full access.

hero.heading: Talk to us
hero.body: Tell us what you’re building and we’ll map the fastest, safest rollout.

hero.heading: Privacy Policy
hero.body: We collect only what’s needed to run the service. Schools control their tenant data boundaries.

sections.title: Data isolation
sections.body: Tenant data is scoped by school_id and enforced by the platform tenancy layer.

/terms.title: Terms of Service — Breslov Academy
/terms.description: Terms of service for platform usage.

hero.heading: Terms of Service
hero.body: By using the platform you agree to follow school policies and respect protected materials.

sections.title: Acceptable use
bullets: Follow applicable laws and school rules

sections.title: Limitations
sections.body: UI-layer protections reduce casual copying; determined users may still attempt bypasses. We continuously harden.
